# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Returns the descriptor object for the specified sample buffer attachment.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(attachmentIndex: Int) -> MTLResourceStatePassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptor! { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **attachmentIndex**: An index for the object to fetch.

## Return Value

The requested [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLResourceStatePassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptor] object.
